dc:title: On Pilgrimage - July/August 1947
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Mentions the many parish churches in the neighborhood, the lengthening food line, a grand Italian wedding, and the books she is reading.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 458 1947-07-03 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
